name: Fish Hunter⭐Ban Ca⭐Bắn Cá

If you really wana get fish hunting fun, with real, fish hunting games 3d then you are on right place. In this Fishing hunter, fish hunting, fish shooter, fish hunting game, games, you’ll act as a fisher and have a deep-ocean experience catching fishes and other sea creatures.

***How to play***
+ Its simplest to learn but harder to be the master of this game.
+ Once the game has begun tap a target to shoot and catch the fish
+ Cheese is available you can use cheese to make fishes come at a specific point place and can shoot at them at once
+ Player can also use the change button to change between the 9 guns at any time during the game, which have various net sizes and power levels player is using;  
+ Use power-up items to enhance your playing 
+ Try to complete all missions
+ Get all fishes as much you can!

+ Game made for all ages including kids – get fishing joy and become fish shooter
+ One of the best Fish hunting, water, sea games, fish hunter shooting game. By one of the top best developers.

Try for being a Fish hunter and get your chance for fish hunting. Totally new features unique game and challenges!!! Best game to play.
